overview: Sen-Yuan (Sandy) Ro joined the Printronix team in August 2010 as the Vice President of Global Operations. Ro will be responsible for overseeing Printronixâ€™s global supply chain and worldwide manufacturing locations in California, China, Holland, Mexico and Singapore. He has more than 25 years of experience in the electronics industry, including 14 years in senior management roles. Ro earned a bachelorâ€™s degree in industrial engineering from National Tsing Hua University in Taiwan. He holds an MBA from Santa Clara University and an MS in mechanical and manufacturing engineering from the University of Massachusetts, Amherst.
